name: Super Spinner Deluxe
description:
SSD (Super Spinning Deluxe) is a fun local multiplayer game for up to four simultaneous players. Each player controls a super spinner in a challenging arena. Kill opponents by crashing them with a higher speed or parry incomming enemies.

Made during a Jame Gam similar project 1 Week at TUM by:

Akbar, Bahy Nguyen, Lydia Marquardt, Paul Hemming und Timotej Svitek
